SEARCH
Package control

Class CampCheckHelperSubSystem

Object
CampCheckHelperSubSystem
public class CampCheckHelperSubSystem extends Object

A class that provides helpers for checking various camp related things, such as if an attendee is allowed to register for a camp.

Since:
24-11-2023
Version:
1.0
Author:
Jon Daniel Acu Kang

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    CampCheckHelperSubSystem.CheckResult
    A boolean wrapper that also contains a failReason indicating the reason why the boolean value is false.

  • Constructor Details

    • CampCheckHelperSubSystem

      public CampCheckHelperSubSystem(CampSystem campSystem)
      Constructor for camp check helper system.
      Parameters:
      campSystem - A class that stores all camps, and controls access to them.

  • Method Details

    • canRegisterAttendee

      public CampCheckHelperSubSystem.CheckResult canRegisterAttendee(Camp camp, Student student)
      A helper function to check if a student can register for a camp as an attendee. Checks if:
      • Camp deadline has not been passed
      • Student is not registered as a committee member
      • Student is not registered as an attendee
      • Dates of the camp does not overlap with other camps registered by the student
      • The camp's committee slots are not filled
      • The camp is open to the student's faculty
      • The student has not withdrawn from this camp in the past
      Parameters:
      camp - The camp being registered for.
      student - The student trying to register.
      Returns:
      Returns a CheckResult

    • canRegisterCommittee

      public CampCheckHelperSubSystem.CheckResult canRegisterCommittee(Camp camp, Student student)
      A helper function to check if a student can register for a camp as a committee member. Checks if:
      • Camp deadline has not been passed
      • Student is not already a committee member
      • Student is not registered as an attendee
      • Dates of the camp does not overlap with other camps registered by the student
      • The camp's committee slots are not filled
      • The camp is open to the student's faculty
      • The student has not withdrawn from this camp in the past
      Parameters:
      camp - The camp being registered for.
      student - The student trying to register.
      Returns:
      Returns a CheckResult

    • checkCampAvailableToStudent

      public CampCheckHelperSubSystem.CheckResult checkCampAvailableToStudent(Camp camp, Student student)
      A helper function to check if a camp is available to a student. Checks if:
      • The camp is not full
      • Camp deadline has not been passed
      • Dates of the camp does not overlap with other camps registered by the student
      • The student has not withdrawn from this camp in the past
      • The camp is open to the student's faculty
      Parameters:
      camp - The camp being checked
      student - The student we are checking for
      Returns:
      Returns a CheckResult

    • checkAttendeeNotRegistered

      private CampCheckHelperSubSystem.CheckResult checkAttendeeNotRegistered(Camp camp, Student student)
      Checks if an attendee is not registered for a camp.
      Parameters:
      camp - The camp.
      student - The attendee.
      Returns:
      Returns a CheckResult with success set to true if the attendee is not registered.

    • checkCommitteeMemberNotRegistered

      private CampCheckHelperSubSystem.CheckResult checkCommitteeMemberNotRegistered(Camp camp, Student student)
      Checks if a committee member is not registered for a camp.
      Parameters:
      camp - The camp.
      student - The attendee.
      Returns:
      Returns a CheckResult with success set to true if the committee member is not registered.

    • checkStudentIsNotCommitteeMember

      private CampCheckHelperSubSystem.CheckResult checkStudentIsNotCommitteeMember(Student student)
      Checks if a student is not already a committee member.
      Parameters:
      student - The student.
      Returns:
      Returns a CheckResult with success set to true if the student is not a committee member.

    • checkCampOpenToFaculty

      private CampCheckHelperSubSystem.CheckResult checkCampOpenToFaculty(Camp camp, Student student)
      Checks if a camp is open to a student's faculty.
      Parameters:
      camp - The camp.
      student - The student.
      Returns:
      Returns a CheckResult with success set to true if the camp is open to whole NTU or is open to the student's faculty.

    • checkStudentNotWithdrawn

      private CampCheckHelperSubSystem.CheckResult checkStudentNotWithdrawn(Camp camp, Student student)
      Checks if a student has previously withdrawn from a camp.
      Parameters:
      camp - The camp.
      student - The student.
      Returns:
      Returns a CheckResult with success set to true if the student has not previously withdrawn from the camp.

    • checkRegistrationOpen

      public CampCheckHelperSubSystem.CheckResult checkRegistrationOpen(Camp camp)
      Checks if a camp's registration deadline has passed.
      Parameters:
      camp - The camp.
      Returns:
      Returns a CheckResult with success set to true if the camp's registration deadline has not passed yet.

    • checkCampSlotsNotFull

      public CampCheckHelperSubSystem.CheckResult checkCampSlotsNotFull(Camp camp)
      Checks if a camp has any available slots, regardless if its attendee or committee member slots.
      Parameters:
      camp - The camp.
      Returns:
      Returns a CheckResult with success set to true if the camp has any available slots.

    • checkDatesNoClash

      public CampCheckHelperSubSystem.CheckResult checkDatesNoClash(Camp camp, Student student, ArrayList<Camp> campsByStudent)
      Checks if dates of camp does not overlap with campsByStudent
      Parameters:
      camp - camp object to check
      student - student object
      campsByStudent - list of camp objects that student is registered for
      Returns:
      returns success if camp does not clash with other camps the student is registered for
